text.siegeweapons.catapult_controls:
Press Shift to dismount the Catapult
Press W, A, S, D to move
Press Space to shoot
Press Mouse-Right to show Trajectory
Press Mouse-Scroll to change the range
text.siegeweapons.ballista_controls:
Press Shift to dismount the Ballista
Press W, A, S, D to move
Press Space to shoot
Press Mouse-Right to show Trajectory
